00010 #include <models/businterface.h>
00011 #include <IPXactWrapper/ComponentEditor/parameters/parametersdelegate.h>
00012 
00013 #include <QHeaderView>
00014 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00015 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00016 
00017 BusIfParametersTab::BusIfParametersTab(void* dataPointer, QWidget *parent): 
00018 QWidget(parent), busif_(static_cast<BusInterface*>(dataPointer)),
00019 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00020 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00021 view_(this), 
00022 model_(&static_cast<BusInterface*>(dataPointer)->getParameters(), this){
00023 
00024         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "BusIfParametersTab constructor",
00025                 "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00026 
00027         connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00028                 &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00029         connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00030                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031 
00032         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00033                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00034         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00035                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00036         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00037                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00038         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00039                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00040 
00041         // set view to be sortable
00042         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00043         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00044         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00045         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00046         view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00047         //view_.setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00048         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00049         view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00050         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00051 
00052         view_.setItemDelegate(new ParametersDelegate(this));
00053 
00054         // set proxy to do the sorting automatically
00055         proxy_ = new QSortFilterProxyModel(this);
00056 
00057         // set source model for proxy
00058         proxy_->setSourceModel(&model_);
00059         // set proxy to be the source for the view
00060         view_.setModel(proxy_);
00061 
00062         // sort the view
00063         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00064 
00065         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00066         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00067         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00068         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00069 
00070         // create the layout, add widgets to it
00071         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00072         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00073         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00074 }

00076 BusIfParametersTab::~BusIfParametersTab() {
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool BusIfParametersTab::isValid() const {
00080         return model_.isValid();
00081 }
00082 
00083 void BusIfParametersTab::restoreChanges() {
00084         model_.restore();
00085 }
00086 
00087 void BusIfParametersTab::applyChanges() {
00088         model_.apply();
00089 }
00090 
00091 void BusIfParametersTab::onRemove() {
00092         QModelIndex index = proxy_->mapToSource(view_.currentIndex());
00093 
00094         // if index is valid then remove the row
00095         if (index.isValid())
00096                 model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00097 }
